titleStmt.title: GratI Falisci Cynegeticon. Or, A poem of hunting by Gratius the Faliscian. Englished and illustrated by Christopher Wase Gent.
Cynegeticon. English and Latin
titleStmt.author: Grattius, Faliscus.
Wase, Christopher, 1625?-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Adams, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Talbot neare St. Dunstans Church in Fleet Street.,

notesStmt.note: The poem has Latin and English texts on facing pages.
"Certaine illustrations of the Cynegeticall poem of Gratius" begins pagination on C6r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Talbot neare St. Dunstans Church in Fleet Street.
